com.netflix.genie.server.services

Interface ClusterLoadBalancer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RandomizedClusterLoadBalancerImpl

    public interface ClusterLoadBalancer
    Interface for the cluster load-balancer, which returns the "best" cluster to run job on from an array of candidates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClusterConfigElement selectCluster(ClusterConfigElement[] ceArray)
      Return best cluster to run job on.

    • Method Detail

      • selectCluster

        ClusterConfigElement selectCluster(ClusterConfigElement[] ceArray)
                                   throws CloudServiceException
        Return best cluster to run job on.
        Parameters:
        ceArray - array of cluster to choose from
        Returns:
        the "best" cluster to run job on
        Throws:
        CloudServiceException - if there is any error
